stepSourceDescRefresh: Você pode atualizar o código-fonte para o estado mais recente ou clicar em PRÓXIMO para ir para a próxima etapa
stepSourceDescDownload: Antes de ir para a próxima etapa, você deve baixar o código-fonte do Tasmota
stepWifiConfDesc: Digite o Nome e a Senha da sua rede WiFi
stepFeaturesBoardDesc: Select board your project is based on
stepFeaturesBoard8266Tooltip: This is probably board you should choose
stepFeaturesBoard82664MTooltip: 4MB ESP8266 boards like Wemos D1 Mini, NodeMCU, etc..
stepFeaturesDesc: Which features should be included in final binary firmware?
stepFeaturesArduinoSlaveTooltip: Support for external microcontroller slave on serial
stepFeaturesDisplaysTooltip: Add support for I2C and SPI diplays
stepFeaturesLightTooltip: Light intensity, light level, UV Index, etc.
stepFeaturesIOExpMCPTooltip: Add support for Input/Output pin expander: MCP230xx
stepFeaturesIRBasicTooltip: Basic infrared support (smaller binary and memmory usage). Exclude the use of full infrared support.
stepFeaturesMQTTTLSTooltip: This feature will work with version 6.6.0.9 or later (latest development).
stepFeaturesRFTransceiverTooltip: Support for RF transceiver using library RcSwitch
stepFeaturesRulesTooltip: It includes IF STATEMENT and EXPRESSION. Rules exclude the use of scripts.
stepFeaturesScriptTooltip: Script excludes the use of rules
stepFeaturesWebInterfaceTooltip: For most users this should be enabled. Disable in case you need smaller binary and less memmory usage. If disabled, interaction with Tasmota firmware will only be possible via MQTT broker.
stepFeaturesZigbeeTooltip: Enable serial communication with Zigbee CC2530 flashed with ZNP or EFR32 EmberZNet devices (like Sonoff Zigbee Bridge) flashed with EZSP
stepFeaturesUFSTooltip: Enable driver for Universal File System
stepFeaturesBerryTooltip: Add support for Berry scripting language
stepCustomParamsDesc: Below you can enter custom parameters, which will be included at the end of {filename} file. If you don't know what it is, just click Next.
stepDownload: You can now download custom compiled binary and files used during compilation:
